juzs.text: Nur response el his popol est their dir Banish Lot's famili your town; ili est popol who wish est pur
Consequently ni sav him his famili escept his wife; ni counted her among des doomed
Ni dusx them nepr dusx. est miserable dusx popol avert
Dir Lauxd est DI pac est His servants whom Li chose! Di bon idols kelk popol est set
Who Unu est kre heavens ter? Who est 1 who send down vi cxiel akv whereby ni produkt gxarden plen de beauty! - Vi possibly ne manufacture its arb? est gxi another di DI? Ja ili est popol who deviated
Who Unu far ter habitable kauxz river kur gxi ej gxi mont est kre barrier 2 akv? est gxi another di DI? Ja plej de them ne kon
Who Unu rescues those est igx desperate vok Him relieves adversity far vi inheritors ter? est gxi another di DI? Rarely do vi pren heed
Who Unu est direkt vi darkness land kaj mar? Who Unu est send vent bon news signaling His mercy? est gxi another di DI? exalted est DI hav any partner
Who Unu iniciat creation est tiam ripet gxi? Who Unu est proviz por vi heaven ter? est gxi another di DI? Dir Montr me your proof se vi est truthful
Dir Ne 1 heavens ter kon future escept DI! Ili do ne eben perceive kiel when ili resurrected
En fakt, their knowledge Hereafter konfuz. En fakt, ili haven dub gxi. En fakt, ili est totally heedless thereof
Those disbelieved dir ni turn into polv ankaux our parents ni get brought out
Ni don sam promes en des preter. These est nothing tales el preter
Dir Roam ter not consequences kulp
Ne grieve them ne annoyed their scheming
Ili dir When promes ven pas vi est truthful
dir Vi jam sufer kelk da retribution vi challenge
Your Lord est plen da grace popol plej de them est unappreciative
Your Lord fully kon ki their kest kasx ki ili deklar
(tie est nothing heavens ter kasx Di;) cxio est profound record
This Quran sald many issues Infan Israel; issues ti ili ankoraux disput
plej assuredly gxi est direkt mercy believers
Your Lord est Unu who jugx them en accordance kun His regul. Li est Almighty Omniscient
Do put your fid DI; vi sekv manifest truth
Vi ne far dead nor surd auxd vok ili turn
Nor can vi direkt blind their straying Nur unu auxd vi est those kred en our revelations decid est submitters
Je tuj temp ni produkt them creature far earthly sxtof deklar ti popol ne est nepr pri our revelations
Tag ven when ni summon cxiu community kelk da those ne kred en our proofs forcibly
When ili alven Li dir Vi rejected My revelations akir knowledge them! this ne ki vi est did
Ili incur requital their wickedness; ili dir nothing
Ili ne seg ni hav far nokt their ripoz tag lighted? These est sufficient proofs popol kred
Tag when korn blov everyone heavens ter horrified escept those chosen DI! All vol ven Him forcibly
When vi rigard mont vi opini ili star ankoraux. Sed ili mov like nub. Such est manufacture DI perfekt cxio. Li est fully Cognizant de cxio vi do
Those bring bon works their records ricev far put rekompenc ili est perfectly secure horrors ke tag
As por those bring evil works ili forced Infer. Vi ne requited ki vi did
Mi simply komand worship Lord this town! - Li far gxi sekur sanctuary - Li posed all ajx. Mi komand est submitter
Kaj al recite Quran! Whoever direkt direkt his own bon kaj se ili ir astray tiam dir mi est simply warner
Dir Lauxd est DI; Li montr vi His proofs gxis vi recognize them! Your Lord est neniam unaware de anything vi do
M
These (liter) constitute proofs this profound libr
Ni recite vi herein kelk histori de Moses Pharaoh truthfully por des benefit de popol kred
Pharaoh torn into tiran ter discriminated kelk popol. Li persekut helpless grup de them bucx their fil while sxpar their daughters! Li est ja wicked
Ni willed kompens those oppressed ter turn them into estr far them inheritors
Kaj al establ them ter don Pharaoh Hamaan their trup gust their own medikament
Ni inspir Moses' mother Nurse him kaj when vi tim his life jxet him into river sen tim grief! Ni return him vi far him 1 messengers
Pharaoh's famili pik him nur hav him plumb opposition est source grief them! Ke est Pharaoh Hamaan their trup est transgressors
Pharaoh's wife dir This est joyous trov me vi. Ne kill him por li est de kelk benefit us ni adopt him est our fil. Ili ne hav ide
Mens Moses' mother kresk tial anxious ti sxi preskaux don for his identity. Ni strengthened her kor far her believer
Sxi dir al his sister Spur his path. Sxi watched him el afar while ili ne perceive
Ni forbade him el akcept all nursing mothers (His sister) tiam dir mi montr vi famili raise him vi sorb bon zorg de him
Tiel ni restored him his mother en ord placx her remove her worries let her kon ti di promes est truth! Tamen plej de them ne kon
When li reached maturity strength ni dot him kun wisdom knowledge! Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous

Once li entered urb unexpectedly sen recognized popol! Li trov 2 hom batal unu est (Hebre) el his popol ali est (Egipt) his enemies. 1 el his popol vok sur him por help his enemy Moses punched him killing him! Li dir This est work diabl; li est efektiv enemy profound misleader
Li dir My Lord mi wronged my anim. Placx forgive me Li forgave him! Li est Forgiver Merciful
Li dir My Lord dors por Your blessings me mi neniam est supporter kulp unu
En des maten li est urb afraid watchful. Unu streb his help hieraux pet his help re. Moses dir al him Vi est really trouble maker
Antaux li prov strik their komun enemy li dir O Moses vi want do kill me as vi killed ali hom hieraux? Obviously vi wish est tiran ter; vi ne wish est righteous
Hom ven kur ali flank de urb dir, O Moses popol est plotting kill vi! Vi bon las tuj! Mi don vi bon advice
Li fled urb afraid watchful. Li dir My Lord sav me el oppressive popol
As li vojagx Midyan li dir maj my Lord direkt me dekstr path
When li reached Midyan's akv li trov crowd popol akv rimark 2 women waiting sur des flank. Li dir Ki est gxi ke vi bezon? Ili dir Ni ne est able al akv crowd disperses our patr est old hom
Li akv them tiam torn shade dir My Lord whatever provision vi send al me mi est en dire bezon por gxi
Baldaux 1 de 2 women approached him shyly dir My patr invit vi pag vi akv us. When li met him told him his fabel li dir ne Hav tim! Vi sav oppressive popol
de 2 women dir O my patr lu him! Li est bon unu lu li est fort honest

Li dir Mi wish ofert 1 de my 2 daughters vi al marry dors working me 8 pilgrimages se vi far them 10 gxi est voluntary your part! Mi ne wish far this materi tro difficult por vi. Vi trov me DI testament righteous
Li dir Gxi est agreement me vi. Whichever period mi fulfill vi ne est averse al either 1. DI est guarantor DE ki NI DIR
(When li fulfilled his obligation li vojagx his famili Egypt). Li seg slope Mount Sinai fajr. Li dir al his famili Rest here. Mi seg fajr. Maybe mi bring vi news portion fajr varm vi
When li reached gxi li est vok rand tuj flank val ben makul brul bush located O Moses this est Me DI; Lord DE UNIVERS
Jxet down your stab. When li seg gxi mov like demon li torn around fled O Moses ven ne est afraid. Vi est perfectly sekur
Put your man into your posx; gxi ven blank blemish Fald your wings sald down your tim! These est 2 proofs el your Lord montr Pharaoh his elders ili est wicked popol
Li dir My Lord mi killed unu de them kaj mi tim lest ili kill me
Ankaux my frat Aaron est eloquent than mi. Send him me helper konfirm strengthen me Mi tim lest ili disbelieve me
Li dir Ni strengthen vi your frat ni proviz vi ambaux manifest auxtoritat. Tiel ili ne est able al tusx either unu de vi. Kun our mirakl 2 de vi together kun those sekv vi est victors
When Moses ir them our proofs klar profound ili dir This fabricated magic Ni neniam auxd this our antikv ancestors
Moses dir My Lord kon put who brought guidance Him est ultimate victors. Surely transgressors neniam sukces
Pharaoh dir O vi elders mi ne kon de any di vi ali than me Do fajr adobe O Hamaan en ord cxarpent tur ke mi pren jen di Moses Mi est sure ke li est liar
Tiel li his trup ad commit arrogance ter any dekstr opini ke ili ne returned us
Consequently ni pun him his trup jxet them into mar. Not consequences transgressors
Ni far them imams plumb their popol al Infer. Furthermore Tag Resurrection ili ne hav help
Ili incurred en this life condemnation Tag Resurrection ili despised
Ni don Moses scripture - Post annihilated previous generaci post setting ekzempl them - Al proviz enlightenment popol guidance mercy ke ili pren heed
Vi est prezent slope western mount when ni issued ordon Moses vi ne est witness
Ni establ many generaci length temp (ili deviated Nor est vi among des popol de Midyan reciting our revelations them! Ni did send messengers)
(Nor est vi slope Mount Sinai when ni vok Moses gxi est mercy your Lord popol) en ord avert popol ne ricev warner vi ke ili pren heed
Tiel ili ne dir when disaster strik them as consequence their own deeds Our Lord hav Vi send messenger us ni sekv Your revelations est believers

Tuj ke truth ven them us ili dir nur ni don ki don Moses ili ne disbelieve en est Did ki don Moses en des preter? Ili dir Ambaux (scriptures) est works de magic ke ekzempler unu another Ili ankaux dir Ni est disbelievers ambaux them
Dir Tiam produkt scripture el DI bon guidance than 2 mi sekv gxi vi est truthful
Ili fail respond vi tiam kon ti ili sekv nur their own opinions. Who est farther astray than those sekv their own opinions guidance el DI? DI NE DIREKT such wicked POPOL
Ni liver message them ke ili pren heed
Those ni ben previous scriptures kred en this
When gxi recited them ili dir Ni kred en gxi. This est truth our Lord Eben antaux ni auxd gxi ni est submitters
Al these ni grant twice rekompenc ili steadfastly persevere Ili counter evil works bon works el our provisions them ili don
When ili ven vain talk ili disregard gxi dir Ni est responsible our deeds vi est responsible por your deeds. Pac est vi. Ni ne wish behave like ignorant unu
Vi ne direkt unu vi am. DI est NUR UNU who DIREKT en accordance kun His VOL en accordance kun His knowledge DE those IND guidance
Ili dir ni sekv your guidance ni sufer persecution. vol ni ne establ them Sankt Sanctuary al which all kinds da frukt ofert provision us? Ja plej de them ne kon
Many community ni annihilated por torn unappreciative de their viv Consequently here est their hejm nothing uninhabited ruin them a few Ni est inheritors
Por your Lord neniam annihilates any community send messenger en des midst thereof recite our revelations al them! Ni neniam annihilate any community its popol est wicked
Cxio don vi est nur sxtof this life its vanity. Ki est DI est far put everlasting Vi ne kompren
ni promes bon promes surely ven pas egal al unu whom ni proviz kun temporary sxtof this life tiam sufer etern doom Tag Resurrection
Tag ven when Li vok them dir Kie those idols vi do gxi est set Me
Those incurred judgment dir Our Lord these est des unu ni misled ni misled them nur ni ir astray. Ni tuj devote totally Vi. Ili really ne worshipping us
(Gxi dir Vok your idols help vi)! Ili vok them ili ne respond! Ili sufer retribution wish ili direkt
Ke tag Li pet everyone vol Kiel vi respond messengers
Ili tial stunned fakt ke tag ili est speechless
As por those pent kred plumb righteous life ili end winners
Your Lord est Unu kre whatever Li vol chooses ne 1 does any choosing Glory est al DI plej Exalted Li far super bezon partners
Your Lord kon innermost thoughts fel en their kest ankaux as cxio ili deklar
Li est 1 DI; tie ne est ali di Him. Al Him aparten all lauxd en this 1 life en Hereafter All judgment aparten Him Him vi returned
Dir Ki se DI far nokt perpetual gxis Tag Resurrection? Which di DI proviz vi can kun light Vi ne auxd
Dir Ki se DI far daylight perpetual gxis Tag Resurrection? Which di DI proviz vi nokt your ripoz? Vi ne seg
(est mercy Him Li kre vi nokt tag en ord ripoz nokt) tiam streb His provisions tag) vi est appreciative
Tag ven when Li pet them Kie idols vi do gxi est fabricated rang Me
Ni select el cxiu community witness tiam dir Prezent your proof Ili realize tiam all truth aparten DI while idols ili fabricated abandon them

(Qaaroon sklav driver) est 1 de Moses' popol perfid them oppressed them! Ni don him many trezor klav thereof est preskaux tro heavy por fort man. His popol dir al him ne est arrogant; DI ne am those est arrogant
Uz provisions bestowed upon vi per DI streb abode Hereafter neglecting your akci en this mond! Est charitable as DI est charitable towards vi. Ne keep corrupting ter! DI NE AM corruptors
Li dir mi ating all this my own cleverness. li ne realize ti DI Did annihilated him generaci est mult fort than li greater en numer annihilated transgressors est pet pri their krim
tag li ven his popol plen splendor. Those prefer this worldly life dir Oh ni wish ni posed ki Qaaroon ating! Ja li est tre fortunate
As por those ben knowledge ili dir Ve al vi di recompense est far put those kred plumb righteous life. Neniom ating this escept des steadfast
Ni tiam kauxz ter glut him his mansion. Ne arme help him DI; li ne destin est winner

Those est envious de him tag antaux dir Nun ni realize ti DI est Unu proviz por whomever Li chooses His servants withholds! Se gxi est por di grace us Li kauxz ter hirund us tro. Ni tuj realize ke disbelievers neniam sukces
Ni rezerv abode Hereafter those ne streb exaltation ter nor corruption. ultimate victory aparten al des righteous
Whoever works righteousness ricev far bon rekompenc! As por those commit pek retribution their pek est precisely ekvivalent al their works
Surely Unu dekret Quran vi summon vi predetermined appointment. Dir My Lord est fully aware da those uphold guidance those ir astray
Vi neniam expected this scripture ven your voj this est mercy your Lord Do vi ne flank disbelievers
Nor shall vi diverted di revelations post ili ven vi invit others al your Lord Ne do ever fal idol worship
Vi ne worship DI any ali di. tie ne est ali di Him. Cxio pere His presence. Al Him aparten all sovereignty al Him vi returned
M
Popol opini ili las dir Ni Do est kred put test
Ni tested those them DI disting those est truthful Li expose liars
those commit pek pens ke ili Do ever mistifik us? Wrong ja est their judgment
(Anyone esper meet DI kon ke) such meeting DI testament plej assuredly ven pas! Li est Hearer Omniscient
Those strive strive their own bon DI est EN ne bezon DE anyone
Those kred plumb righteous life ni certainly remit their pek certainly rekompenc them generously por their righteous works
Ni enjoined human est honor his parents Ili pen force vi set idols Me ne obe them! Al Me est your ultimate return tiam mi inform vi de cxio vi done
Those kred plumb righteous life ni certainly admit them kun des righteous

Among des popol tie est those dir Ni kred en DI as baldaux as ili sufer any hardship DI ili equate popol persecution di retribution! Se blessings el your Lord ven your voj ili dir Ni vi. est Est DI ne fully awareof popol innermost thoughts
DI testament plej certainly DISTING those kred LI testament plej certainly expose hypocrites
Those disbelieved dir al those kred vi sekv our voj ni est responsible your pek. Ne prav; ili ne bor any da their pek. Ili est liars
En fakt, ili port their own pek ankaux al loads ali popol pek ili est responsible. plej certainly ili pet Tag Resurrection their false pretend
Ni send Noah his popol li rest them 1000 jar malpli 50. Subsequently ili incurred inund their transgressions
Ni sav him those akompan him ark ni set gxi lecion all popol
Abraham dir al his popol Vi worship DI reverence Him! This est put vi se vi nur kon

Ki vi worship DI est powerless idols; vi invent mensog idols vi worship DI ne posed any provisions vi! Do vi streb provisions nur el DI. Vi worship Him sol est appreciative de Him; Him est your ultimate return
Vi disbelieve generaci vi ankaux disbelieved Pland funkci messenger est liver message
Hav ili ne seg kiel DI iniciat creation tiam! Ripet gxi? This est facil DI do
Dir Roam ter trov out origin life. Por DI testament tiel iniciat creation Hereafter DI est Omnipotent
Li kondamn retribution whomever Li vol dusx His mercy whomever Li vol. Ultimately al Him vi est torn over
Neniom da vi escape these fakt ter heaven vi hav neniom DI as Lord Mastr
Those disbelieve di revelations en meeting Him despaired My mercy! Ili incurred painful retribution
Nur response el his popol est their dir Kill him brul him. DI sav him el fajr! This proviz lecion popol who kred

Li dir Vi worship DI powerless idols peer pressure just konfit kelk friendship vi en this worldly life! Tiam Tag Resurrection vi disown unu another curse 1 another Your destiny est Infer wherein vi ne help 1 another
Lot kred him dir mi emigrating my Lord Li est Almighty plej Sagx
Ni granted him Isaac Jacob ni asign his descendants prophethood scriptures ni dot him his due recompense en this life Hereafter li surely est kun des righteous
Lot dir al his popol Vi commit such abomen ne 1 en des mond ever done gxi vi
Vi practice seks hom vi commit sxose robbery vi allow all kinds da vice your soci. nur response el his popol est dir Bring al us di retribution vi est truthful
Li dir My Lord grant me victory these wicked popol
(When our messengers ir Abraham bon news Isaac's nask) ili ankaux dir Ni est sur our voj annihilate popol de ke town (Sodom) its popol est wicked
Li dir Lot viv tie. Ili dir Ni est fully aware da everyone who viv en gxi. Ni do gxi da kurs sav him his famili escept his wife; sxi doomed
When our messengers alven Lot's met ili mistreated li embarrassed their presence. Ili dir ne Hav tim ne worry Ni sav vi your famili escept your wife; sxi doomed
Ni versx popol de this town disaster el cxiel consequence their wickedness
Ni las bud kelk da their ruin al dejxor profound lecion popol kompren
Al Midyan ni send their frat Shu aib. Li dir O my popol vi worship DI streb Last Tag ne roam ter corruptingly
Ili disbelieved him consequently earthquake annihilated them; ili las dead their hejm per maten
Similarly 'Aad Thamoud annihilated This far manifest vi tra their ruin. Diabl ornam their works their okul diverted them path eben ili hav okul
Ankaux Qaaroon Pharaoh Hamaan; Moses ir al them klar sign! Ili ad commit tyranny ter! Consequently ili ne evade (retribution)

All those disbelievers doomed consequence their pek. Kelk da them ni annihilated violent vund kelk annihilated quake kelk ni kauxz ter hirund kelk ni dron. DI NE est UNU wronged them; est ILI wronged their own ANIM
allegory de those akcept ali mastr DI est ti de arane her hejm; flimsiest de all hejm est hejm arane ili nur kon
DI kon PLEN PUT KE whatever ILI worship Him est really nothing. Li est Almighty plej Sagx
Ni cite these ekzempl popol neniom sxat them escept des knowledgeable
DI KRE heavens TER truthfully. This proviz sufficient proof believers
Vi recite ki revealed vi de scripture observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) por Kontakt Prayers prohibit evil vice remembrance DI Salat) est plej grav objective DI kon CXIO VI do
